title: Tri-City Americans Singles Night
text:
6:00 p.m. Saturday, Nov. 7, 2015 Categories 
Events, Nightlife | Singles, Sports Are you single and ready to mingle? Join us at the 1st ever Tri-City Americans SINGLES NIGHT Saturday 11/07/15 Tri-City Americans Vs. Spokane Chiefs @ the Toyota Center in Kennewick *Happy Hour 5:30pm-7pm Drink specials and FREE snacks in the Charter HD Lounge, 3rd floor Game Time 7:05pm $15 TICKETS (Save up to 25%) Just mention "Singles Night" when purchasing at the Toyota Center Box Office and you will be placed in the special Single's Section! *must be 21 or over
